https://tmrev.io/movie/803189-Barrabackslarrabang 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/a9kdMIpEd78R9mHEV4peMtX8kXI.jpg Shot in two Liverpool pubs, Barrabackslarrabang features characters speaking in two different forms of backslang – a form of slang associated with working class culture that traditionally evolved out of the need to speak privately about illegal activity – exploring language as a site of refuge, resistance, identity and desire. Barrabackslarrabang
